I master ORACLE, MySQL, POSTGRESQL, MongoDB, # / C / C++, Python and good knowledge of Linux systems, Windows and cisco configurations switch and router. resume.skillmessage: I am a Computer Programming & Analysis Student oriented towards client / server applications and database management.

education.degree: Computer Programming & Analysis - Advanced Diploma Degree

Researching Tools | Organizing and Stylizing | Writing Creative | Grammar and Vocabulary Skills | Reading Comprehension | Analytical Interpretation | Presentation skills | Effective listening.

work.title: Database developer intership
work.description: Taking ownership of database-related problems | Help with database design and data model decisions | Expert proposal on SQL optimization, stored procedure design, and other database performance issues | Perform database tuning activities to ensure optimal performance | Application of high database standards | Review and approve the entire database design | Develop and build systems for end-users.

work.title: SQL developer intership
work.description: Served as the initial contact person for all SQL support queries | Performed updates to the SQL system as assigned by management | Collaborated with senior engineer and business support professionals to provide full system maintenance and produce ingenious solutions for the system | Review/examination and resolution of applied problems | Developed MS Access applications using Access for the front end and SQL in the back end | Wrote SQL queries in MS Access 2007 | Delivered database deployment through the whole system lifecycle

testimonials.text: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And the only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven’t found it yet, keep looking. Don’t settle.
Stephane is a very experienced database developer and whatever the database management system (Oracle, MySQL, SQL Server, etc ...) I highly recommend him.
